turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I need to order three large thin crust pizzas from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what toppings would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: One of them I want the whole pizza to be Milano.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Pizza, the second one the Mediterranean, and the third one, the house special.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: they have a supreme pizza, is that what you mean by house special?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I guess that will work.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering 3 large thin crust pizzas, one milano, one mediterranean, and one supreme, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, your total will be $72, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: It's expensive, but yeah, that'll be fine I guess as for pick-up.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, your receipt will be texted to you and your pizzas will be ready for pickup in 35 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?
